title: Fix admin dashboard bookings visibility, restore payment details, and add screenshot option

requirements.text: Fix the admin dashboard so that table bookings submitted by users appear correctly. Ensure that after a user submits a booking via the Contact/booking page, it is retrievable and displayed in the Admin dashboard booking list without requiring a manual refresh or re-login.
acceptanceCriteria: After a user submits a table booking, it appears in the admin dashboard booking list
Admin can see all submitted bookings including name, date, time, party size, and contact info
Bookings persist and are visible after admin logs out and back in

requirements.text: Restore the payment details section in the booking form on the Contact page. The section should allow users to enter or view payment-related information (e.g., advance payment amount, payment method, UPI/bank details for the restaurant) as part of the table booking flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Payment details section is visible in the booking form or booking confirmation flow
Payment details submitted by the user are stored with the booking record
Admin dashboard displays the payment details alongside each booking entry

requirements.text: Add a screenshot/capture option in the booking confirmation flow. After a user successfully submits a booking, provide a button that allows them to take or download a screenshot of their booking confirmation details (booking ID, name, date, time, party size, payment info) as an image or printable view.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Save / Screenshot' button is displayed on the booking confirmation screen after successful submission
Clicking the button captures or downloads a formatted confirmation card showing booking details
The confirmation card includes booking ID, guest name, date, time, party size, and payment details
The feature works without any third-party external service

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Keep all Motoko backend logic within the single actor in backend/main.mo
Preserve existing admin authentication flow (Internet Identity + hardcoded password)
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall visual theme or layout of the app
Adding new payment gateway integrations (e.g., Stripe, Razorpay)
